resources:
Kotlin-30" 30 Days Kotlin Projects
Hello World App Basic Calculator User Input Unit Converter Simple To-Do List Weather App Number Guessing Game BMI Calculator Random Quote Generator Counter App Stopwatch Currency Converter Flashlight App Grocery List Simple Quiz App Notes App Basic Countdown Timer Interactive Story App Rock, Paper, Scissors Game Dice Roller Tip Tracker Advanced Calculator Basic Recipe App Random Joke Generator Expense Tracker Mini E-commerce App Customizable Timer Habit Tracker Movie Rating App Simple Chat App
Day 1: Day 2: Day 3: Day 4: Day 5: Day 6: Day 7: Day 8: Day 9: Day 10: Day 11: Day 12: Day 13: Day 14: Day 15: Day 16: Day 17: Day 18: Day 19: Day 20: Day 21: Day 22: Day 23: Day 24: Day 25: Day 26: Day 27: Day 28: Day 29: Day 30:
Create a simple app that displays \"Hello World\" on the screen. Build a basic calculator that can perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. Build a simple program that asks for the userâ€™s name and greets them. Make a unit converter for converting between different units (e.g., meters to feet). Develop a simple To-Do List where users can add and check off tasks. Create a mock weather app that displays hardcoded weather information. Build a number guessing game where users guess a random number generated by the app. Create a BMI Calculator that calculates and displays the user\'s Body Mass Index. Build a random quote generator that displays a new quote every time a button is pressed. Create a simple counter app that increments or decrements a number each time a button is pressed. Build a stopwatch app with start, stop, and reset functionality. Create a currency converter that converts between predefined currencies using hardcoded rates. Develop a simple flashlight app that turns on/off the device\'s flashlight. Create a grocery list app where users can add and remove items. Build a simple quiz app with multiple-choice questions and correct/incorrect feedback. Create a notes app where users can write, edit, and delete notes. Develop a basic countdown timer with start, pause, and reset functionality. Create an interactive story app that changes based on the user\'s choices. Build a simple Rock, Paper, Scissors game where the user plays against the computer. Develop a dice roller app that generates a random dice roll on button press. Create a tip tracker where users can enter tips they receive and see the total. Build an advanced calculator with additional functions like square roots and percentages. Develop a basic recipe app where users can browse through predefined recipes. Create a random joke generator that displays a new joke every time a button is pressed. Build an expense tracker where users can add expenses and see the total spent. Create a mini e-commerce app that displays a list of products and allows users to "purchase" them (mock data). Develop a customizable timer where users can set their own countdown duration. Build a habit tracker where users can log and track daily habits. Create a movie rating app where users can browse and rate movies. Develop a simple chat app that displays hardcoded messages and allows the user to send mock messages.
Easy Medium Hard
